title: Niobrara National Scenic River: Weather
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Weather              Weather       Summer (June-August): highs - low 80s to low 100s; lows -  50s to 60s, with occasional thunderstorms and associated strong winds. Moderate dry winds are common in the summer. 8.3" is average summer rainfall. Spring (April/May) and Fall (September/October) have cooler temperatures: average highs 60-70s, average lows 30-40s with 7.3" average rain/snowfall. Click for current conditions at the Norden Bridge.
